notes.text:
This update for targetcli-fb fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-13867: Fixed the permissions in /etc/target (bsc#1172743)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Open-iSCSI targetcli-fb through 2.1.52 has weak permissions for /etc/target (and for the backup directory and backup files).
notes.title: Vulnerability description
